October Promotion: Stand a chance to win R1 000000 (One Million Rands) Competition Terms & Conditions
HomeChoice (Pty) Limited (“HomeChoice”, “we”, “our” or “us”) is the promoter of this competition in conjunction with FoneChoice, a division of HomeChoice.
  1. HomeChoice owns and manages the website located at www.homechoice.co.za (“website”) and the mobi-page at [https://m.homechoice.co.za] (“mobi-page”).
  2. By entering this competition, you agree that these competition rules will apply to you and bind you to the extent permitted in law. These rules, should they require interpretation, will be interpreted in accordance with applicable South African laws.
  3. You may obtain a copy of the competition rules from competitions@homechoice.co.za or from the website at https://www.homechoice.co.za/official-rules
  4. Entry to the competition happen automatically on the following qualifying criteria and subject to these terms:
    1. Existing HomeChoice customers not making a purchase during the competition period:
      • You will receive 1 (one) entry if you have an outstanding balance at any time during the competition period provided that your account is in good-standing (not in arrears) at any time during the competition period.
    2. Existing customers making a purchase during the competition period:
      • In addition to (i), you will receive another entry for every call centre or showroom purchase successfully despatched during the competition period;
      • In addition to (i), you will receive another two entries for every website or USSD purchase successfully despatched during the competition period.
    3. New HomeChoice customers purchasing during the competition period:
      • You will receive 1 (one) entry for every successfully despatched order during the competition period purchased through any channel;
      • In addition, you will receive two entries for every website or USSD purchase successfully despatched during the competition period.
    4. Existing and new customers purchasing through the call centre and showrooms during the period 11 October 2019 00:00:00 to 25th October 23:59:59:
      • For this week only, you will receive 4 (four) additional entries (and not only one) for all call centre and showroom purchases despatched during the competition period.
  5. The competition runs from 29 September 2019 00:00:00 to 31 October 2019 23:59:59 (“the competition period”).
  6. You can enter the competition by
    • 6.1. Purchasing any product during the competition period, via any of our shopping channels:
      • Our website;
      • Telephone;
      • USSD;
      • Showroom;
      • Sales agents.
  7. Please note that orders may be through any channel listed in clause 7 above. HomeChoice will take all reasonable steps to ensure that your order placed will be recorded, it will not be liable for any technical problems or any lost, delayed or incorrectly received entries.
  8. The prize: one lucky winner will win a cash prize of R1,000,000 (one million rands only) which will be paid out in five equal disbursements of R200,000 (two hundred thousand rand) over a 5-year period (the "Prize"), the first payment to be made on [insert] and annually thereafter.
  9. The Prize is not transferable, unless we agree otherwise in our discretion.
  10. The winner will be selected by random draw and the process will be overseen by an independent attorney or accountant who will also report on the competition in accordance with all relevant regulatory requirements.
  11. In order to qualify as a winner, you may not be (a) under debt review or in the process to apply for debt review; or (b) a director, member, partner, agent, employee or consultant of the promoter or any supplier of goods or services in connection with the competition, or any other person who directly or indirectly controls or is controlled by the promoter; and/or (c) the spouse, life partner, business partner or associate, or the natural or adopted parent, child, or sibling, of any of the persons specified in (b).
  12. The Prize draw will take place within fourteen business days after the closing date of the competition. If the winner’s account is in default at any time from the time of entry to the time of the draw, the winner will immediately be disqualified, and another winner will be selected.
  13. The winner will be contacted via e-mail and/or sms and/or telephone at which point arrangements will be made for the winner to receive their prizes. If HomeChoice is not able to contact the winner despite reasonable attempts within 10 calendar days, it reserves the right to disqualify the winner and select an alternative winner, in which event the initial winner will have no recourse against HomeChoice. The winner, once successfully contacted, will also be announced on the HomeChoice website, mobi-pages and social media accounts.
  14. The winner/s may be taxed in terms of applicable tax legislation and participants who require clarity as to the tax implications hereof should seek a directive from the relevant revenue service/authority.
  15. HomeChoice will use the winner’s name/s and/or photograph/s in any promotional and/or advertising material for the purposes of HomeChoice marketing, unless the winner objects to such use in writing.
  16. The winner will be required to sign a winner’s declaration form and other related documentation as required by law and will also need to provide proof of identity. The winner may not receive the Prize if it is against the law for the winner to receive it.
  17. We may require winners to provide us with such additional information that we may reasonably require in order to process and facilitate their acceptance and/or use of the Prize.
  18. The promoter reserves the right, in its sole discretion, to cancel or suspend any competition or change the rules if errors need to be corrected, or to prevent any party from being unduly prejudiced or favoured.
  19. PLEASE NOTE THAT BY ENTERING INTO THE COMPETITION YOU MAY STAND A CHANCE TO WIN A PRIZE AND THERE ARE NO GUARANTEES.
  20. If a competition or promotion is cancelled or suspended due to any reasons, all participants or entrants agree to waive any rights that they may have in terms of the competition and acknowledge that they have no recourse against HomeChoice, their employees, agents, partners, suppliers, sponsors or promoters.
  21. Any violation or attempt to violate any of the above rules will result in the immediate disqualification of the transgressor.
  22. The Prize is provided “as is” and HomeChoice disclaims liability however arising out of your use of the Prize.
  23. You hereby indemnify and hold harmless HomeChoice (including its directors, employees, members, independent contractors, agents, consultants, sub-contractors and other representatives) from any and all direct, indirect or consequential loss or damages suffered as a result of any action or omission relating to this competition and/or the award of any Prize.
